Name: Veteran Agent Power Suit
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Veteran Agents will ride a Power Suit that can use the Double Jump skill to move very quickly.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Veteran Agents will ride a Power Suit that can use the Double Jump skill to move very quickly. Double-click the destination on the World Map to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available on some continents, including Victoria Island. Buy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin to use the Smart Mount on more continents.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Veteran Agents will ride a Power Suit that can use the Double Jump skill to move very quickly.

H.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 180, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120
H.New: Increases DEF by 10, Speed by 180, Jump by 120

h1.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 180, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120
h1.New: Increases DEF by 10, Speed by 180, Jump by 120

HFields.h1: Increases DEF by 10, Speed by 180, Jump by 120
